attributes.action: Ignore the courts and kick Abu Qatada OUT to Jordan or anyway else
attributes.additional_details:
Another court case fails on grounds of human rights. This has gone on to far costing the UK tax payers way to much cash. Abu Qatada is a preacher of hatred and a terrorist to the West and is being protected at extreme costs to the Taxpayers of this country.

We the people of the United kingdom who can easily vote you out as an MP, demand you to remove him NOW. Forget the courts. Kick out to Jordan or any other country we don't care. Save our money and get him out.

Where is the human rights of the victims. Everyone always forgets about the victims of an alleged crime
